titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend educational assistance benefits to dependents of veterans with a service-connected disability of 80 percent or more.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education, Training and Employment.

bill.summary: 7/28/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal veterans' educational assistance provisions to extend educational assistance benefits to dependents of veterans with a service-connected disability rating of 80 percent or more (currently, 100 percent).
